title: Brightline CEO on Tackling the Mental-Health Crisis
itunes:title: Brightline CEO on Tackling the Mental-Health Crisis
description:
Naomi Allen, CEO at Brightline, discusses her startup, a provider of virtual behavioral-health services to children and their families.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
